titleStmt.title: A famous speech of King Henry the eighth, made in the Parliament House the 24. of December, in the 37. yeare of his Majesties reigne. Anno Dom. 1545. Tending to charity and concord, and therefore necessary for men of these times.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
Henry VIII, King of England, 1491-1547.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
